CustomField.description: [EBH] (EPH-1866) - Automatically populate the Seller Store URL Created
CustomField.formula: CASE( EBH_PrimarySite__c , "Germany", (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.de/usr/"+Name, "Click here")), "France", (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.fr/usr/"+Name, "Click here")), "Spain", (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.es/usr/"+Name, "Click here")), "Italy", (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.it/usr/"+Name, "Click here")), "UK", (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.co.uk/usr/"+Name, "Click here")), "Australia", (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.com.au/usr/"+Name, "Click here")), (HYPERLINK("//www.ebay.com/usr/"+Name, "Click here")))
CustomField.label: eBay Profile URL
